channel.title: Loading bar

item.title: Loading bar
item.dc:creator: @Gardenn Gardenn
item.description:
@Gardenn wrote:

How would I fix this issue for my loading bar?
There is only 2 different screens it shows…
Screen one - http://prntscr.com/75pqpj
Screen two - Goes to the normal login screen which is correct after it loads

My drawloading

[code]void drawLoadingText(int i, String s)
{
anInt1079 = i;
aString1049 = s;
resetImageProducers();
if(titleStreamLoader == null)
{
super.drawLoadingText(i, s);
return;
}
loginScreenArea.initDrawingArea();
char c = ‘\u0168’;
char c1 = ‘\310’;
byte byte1 = 20;
newRegularFont.drawCenteredString(s + “TorvaX”, 180, 46, 0xFFFFFD, 0);
int j = c1 / 2 - 18 - byte1;
DrawingArea.fillPixels(c / 2 - 152, 304, 34, 0x8c1111, j);
DrawingArea.fillPixels(c / 2 - 151, 302, 32, 0, j + 1);
int color = 0x8c1111;
int color2 = 0;

	while(color2 <= 30)
	{
		DrawingArea.drawPixels(30-color2, j + 2, c / 2 - 150, color, i * 3);
		color += 65536*3;
		color2 += 1;
	}
	loginScreenArea.drawGraphics(171, super.graphics, 202);
	if(welcomeScreenRaised)
	{
		welcomeScreenRaised = false;
		if(!aBoolean831)
		{
			leftSideFlame.drawGraphics(0, super.graphics, 0);
			rightSideFlame.drawGraphics(0, super.graphics, 637);
		}
		aRSImageProducer_1107.drawGraphics(0, super.graphics, 128);
		aRSImageProducer_1108.drawGraphics(371, super.graphics, 202);
		gameLogo.drawGraphics(265, super.graphics, 0);
		aRSImageProducer_1113.drawGraphics(265, super.graphics, 562);
		aRSImageProducer_1114.drawGraphics(171, super.graphics, 128);
		aRSImageProducer_1115.drawGraphics(171, super.graphics, 562);
	}
}[/code]
